title: Three men nabbed with ICE from Negombo
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Three suspects have been arrested during an operation carried out by the officers of the Negombo Divisional Crime Investigation Bureau in Negombo with over 1 1/2Kg of ICE.

The first suspect was arrested in the Negombo area with 120g of ice and following interrogation, another suspect was arrested with 157g of ice, according to his revelation the third suspect was arrested with one kilogram and 157g of ice.
The suspects are residents of Negombo and Colombo 12, and are to be produced before the Negombo Magistrate’s Court on Thursday (26).
